trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when policy forbids code to run.
trans-unit.target: 原則禁止程式碼執行時擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: This exception is typically thrown when the code requests more permissions than the policy will grant or the policy is configured to prohibit running the code.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼要求超過該原則所允許或禁止執行程式碼中設定的原則需權限時，通常會擲回這個例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: PolicyException uses the HRESULT CORSEC_E_POLICY_EXCEPTION.
trans-unit.target: PolicyException 會使用 HRESULT CORSEC_E_POLICY_EXCEPTION。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of PolicyException, see the constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需 PolicyException 的執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyException"></xref> class with default properties.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyException"></xref>使用預設屬性的類別。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyException>.</xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyException>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The localized error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|當地語系化的錯誤訊息字串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyException>.</xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyException>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|`null`.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|錯誤訊息字串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況的原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyException"></xref>使用序列化資料的類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 重新建構所需的資料流上傳輸的例外狀況物件的還原序列化期間呼叫這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 保存序列化的物件資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 關於來源或目的端內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Policy.PolicyException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 做為前一個例外狀況直接結果應該包括在前一個例外狀況的參考就會擲回的例外狀況<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性會傳回相同的值傳遞到建構函式，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyException>.</xref:System.Security.Policy.PolicyException>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|The inner exception reference.| |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|The error message string.|
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>|內部例外狀況參考。 | |<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>|錯誤訊息字串。 |</xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解釋例外狀況的原因的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前例外狀況的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the `exception` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`exception`參數不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引發目前的例外狀況<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>處理內部例外狀況區塊。
